member.name: P:_Shared.ICWException.Message
member.summary: Overridden property so we can set the message outside of the constructor. The Base Message Property is readonly.

member.name: M:_Shared.ICWException.RaiseError(_Shared.LibErrorEnum,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Error message based on LibErrorEnum values.
member.returns: String containg a message, relavant to the errorNumber

member.name: M:_Shared.ICWException.GetNestedExceptions
member.summary: Gets inner exceptions and display as message. Each exception may have its own inner exception. Loop through these inner exceptions, displaying each message in turn, seperated by new line character.
member.returns: String of exceptions seperated by a new line.
